alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson, west central Taylor and southeastern Leon Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Marks, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Newport, Shadeville, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Thomas City, Vereen, Plum Orchard, Scanlon, Port Leon, Fanlew, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Bethel and Natural Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Leon
